explains: n. 持久力，忍耐力；耐久性，耐用度
wordGroup: endurance test 耐久试验，耐力测验；疲劳试验
endurance training 耐力训练，耐力练习
heat endurance 热稳定性；耐热性
endurance race 拉力赛，耐力赛
endurance limit 耐久强度；疲劳极限；持久极限
folding endurance 耐折度；耐折性；耐折强度

sentences.en: He showed remarkable endurance throughout his illness.
sentences.cn: 他在整个生病期间表现出非凡的忍耐力。

sentences.en: The exercise obviously will improve strength and endurance.
sentences.cn: 这项练习将明显增强力量和耐力。

sentences.en: He used to astound his friends with feats of physical endurance.
sentences.cn: 他过去常以身体耐力之好令其朋友们震惊。
